about_the_game:
On the revolution bridge, K-12 and Z4 raise up against those who rose up before. Those who were his former battle partners.

PROTOCOL:NULL

It is a third-person shooter set in the cyberpunk world, taking place in the futuristic and uneven EAcity, the game is separated into phases, with its own characteristics but focusing on horde survival and tower defense elements.

STORY

In EA-city a new gang emerges, the group formed of: replicants, droids and robots called themselves DICE, the group rebelled against the large corporation Actavision Corps. The first confrontation ended with a victory for DICE, in which a large Actavision factory was taken over, and became the gang's base, Actavision joined forces with other companies such as Capskon and Kimami, and subsequently a series of confrontations occurred between them, Several protests emerge, gradually damaging the image of companies.
The city has turned into chaos, two DICE soldiers stand out, K-12 and Z4 join the elite group Task Force 414, carrying out sabotage missions in companies. However, after a mission, Z4 is captured and his programming is changed, and he now follows Actavision's orders,
His new objective is to take a bomb to the DICE base, K-12, aiming to save his friend, makes a deal with Actavision, so that the two can be free after completing their mission. This way, the two go to the headquarters of their old gang.

FEATURES

  • Play with two different characters and their respective classes;
  • Play with eight different weapons;
  • Test your weapons in firerange;
  • Weapons and Characters have their own progression and customization, you can unlock Weapons, Attachments, Classes, Skills, Items, Skins and Camos;
  • Differente playstyles;
  • Buy Supplies and Interact with the environment to survive;
  • Upgrade the car;
  • Push and Defend the car against hordes of enemies;
  • Play Chosen Asteroid;

GENERAL INFOS

  • The game will be updated periodically after release;
  • Support for the main controls on the market;
  • Support for Steam achievement;

name: Protocol:null

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Rayzen 3 or Intel core I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 920mx
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Rayzen 5 or Intel core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 TI

short_description: In EAcity, the DICE gang rebelled against large corporations, sparking a series of clashes between the two sides. The city descended into chaos. In an attempt to end the conflict, two gang members, K-12 and Z4, were kidnapped by Actavision corp and forced to sabotage DICE headquarters.
